definition.name: Azure Machine Learning Deploy Action
definition.description: Deploy a registered model in your Azure Machine Learning Workspace with this GitHub Action
definition.author: azure/gh-aml

inputs.name: azure_credentials
inputs.description: Paste output of `az ad sp create-for-rbac --name <your-sp-name> --role contributor --scopes /subscriptions/<your-subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/<your-rg> --sdk-auth` as value of secret variable: AZURE_CREDENTIALS

inputs.name: model_name
inputs.description: Name of the model that will be deployed

inputs.name: model_version
inputs.description: Version of the model that will be deployed

inputs.name: parameters_file
inputs.description: JSON file including the parameters for deployment. This looks in the .ml/.azure/ directory

outputs.name: service_scoring_uri
outputs.description: Scoring URI of the webservice that was created (only provided if delete_service_after_deployment is set to False)

outputs.name: service_swagger_uri
outputs.description: Swagger URI of the webservice that was created (only provided if delete_service_after_deployment is set to False)

outputs.name: acr_address
outputs.description: The DNS name or IP address (e.g. myacr.azurecr.io) of the Azure Container Registry (ACR) (only provided if create_image is not None)

outputs.name: acr_username
outputs.description: The username for ACR (only provided if create_image is not None)

outputs.name: acr_password
outputs.description: The password for ACR (only provided if create_image is not None)

outputs.name: package_location
outputs.description: Full URI of the docker image (e.g. myacr.azurecr.io/azureml/azureml_*) (only provided if create_image is not None)

outputs.name: profiling_details
outputs.description: Dictionary of details of the model profiling result. This will only be provided, if the model profiling method is used and successfully executed.
